Entries.DialogueText: Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, yes. I have predicted your arrival a long time ago, young .

Entries.DialogueText: However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.
Entries.DisplayPattern: However, your fate is ultimately in your own hands.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, what do we have here? A rare and potent elixir, it seems. Yes, this will make a fine addition to my reagent chest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, what do we have here? A rare and potent elixir, it seems. Yes, this will make a fine addition to my reagent chest.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... an arctic shard.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... an arctic shard.

Entries.DialogueText: A most powerful substance, indeed, and potently infused with the element of ice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A most powerful substance, indeed, and potently infused with the element of ice.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll take it, if you don't mind.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll take it, if you don't mind.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Erm...You're still here. Oh. You want something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Erm...You're still here. Oh. You want something?

Entries.DialogueText: ...Take this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Take this.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I suppose I could accompany you... yes. Once you've arrived, I shall appear. Farewell.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I suppose I could accompany you... yes. Once you've arrived, I shall appear. Farewell.

Entries.DialogueText: Though the unusual rains may be alarming, there is nothing to fear on this day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though the unusual rains may be alarming, there is nothing to fear on this day.

Entries.DialogueText: In fact, it is a day of great joy for many living things.
Entries.DisplayPattern: In fact, it is a day of great joy for many living things.

Entries.DialogueText: Nature is a powerful force, not to be trifled with.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nature is a powerful force, not to be trifled with.

Entries.DialogueText: Excuse me, but there are special matters I can only attend to on this day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Excuse me, but there are special matters I can only attend to on this day.

Entries.DialogueText: Marriage... hmm? I pray that you have better luck than I did...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Marriage... hmm? I pray that you have better luck than I did...

Entries.DialogueText: It will be a challenge, to live with one such as Krobus. But richly rewarding to both parties, I'm sure.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It will be a challenge, to live with one such as Krobus. But richly rewarding to both parties, I'm sure.

Entries.DialogueText: I admit, I am most interested to see the outcome of such an unusual friendship.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I admit, I am most interested to see the outcome of such an unusual friendship.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, yes. I have seen many things about your future, young {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, yes. I have seen many things about your future, young .

Entries.DialogueText: If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I were to tell you, there could be grave consequences.

Entries.DialogueText: Outside the domain of human civilization is where nature truly reveals its secrets.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Outside the domain of human civilization is where nature truly reveals its secrets.

Entries.DialogueText: There are areas of the world, yet unsullied by the constraints of modern thinking, where magic is still very much alive...
Entries.DisplayPattern: There are areas of the world, yet unsullied by the constraints of modern thinking, where magic is still very much alive...

Entries.DialogueText: While the scientific practice may accurately describe the material of our world, it will never explain the deepest mysteries...
Entries.DisplayPattern: While the scientific practice may accurately describe the material of our world, it will never explain the deepest mysteries...

Entries.DialogueText: If you have nothing important to tell me, leave me be. I have much work to do.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you have nothing important to tell me, leave me be. I have much work to do.

Entries.DialogueText: I trust you enough to allow you in my basement. Treat what you find there with respect.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I trust you enough to allow you in my basement. Treat what you find there with respect.

Entries.DialogueText: Greetings, {Farmer_Name}. I trust you haven't been dabbling in the dark arts?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Greetings, . I trust you haven't been dabbling in the dark arts?

Entries.DialogueText: If reality is constructed by the mind, then if one were to master the power of mind, they could control reality...
Entries.DisplayPattern: If reality is constructed by the mind, then if one were to master the power of mind, they could control reality...

Entries.DialogueText: It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It takes years of study to understand the language of the elementals.

Entries.DialogueText: To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.
Entries.DisplayPattern: To actually speak their language requires a lifetime of devoted effort.

Entries.DialogueText: Now, if you'll excuse me...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now, if you'll excuse me...

Entries.DialogueText: There are many mysteries around us. You must be patient if you wish to discover them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There are many mysteries around us. You must be patient if you wish to discover them.

Entries.DialogueText: You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...

Entries.DialogueText: I could be mistaken... It's rare, but it does happen.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I could be mistaken... It's rare, but it does happen.

Entries.DialogueText: I believe the townsfolk are afraid of me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I believe the townsfolk are afraid of me.

Entries.DialogueText: It is unfortunate, but I suppose it is human to be afraid of the unknown.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It is unfortunate, but I suppose it is human to be afraid of the unknown.

Entries.DialogueText: I was married, long ago. After my wife and I split, she began flying around the countryside, cursing everything she saw.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was married, long ago. After my wife and I split, she began flying around the countryside, cursing everything she saw.

Entries.DialogueText: It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.

Entries.DialogueText: Beware, you are standing above a potent magical field.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Beware, you are standing above a potent magical field.

Entries.DialogueText: I built my hut right here on purpose, you know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I built my hut right here on purpose, you know.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you made any headway with the forest spirits?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you made any headway with the forest spirits?

Entries.DialogueText: I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I sometimes observe the local villagers in secret.

Entries.DialogueText: I am hoping to find an apprentice. Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I am hoping to find an apprentice. Some day I will leave this mortal plane, but my arcane pursuits must continue.

Entries.DialogueText: Stormy days are the only time I can commune with certain elementals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stormy days are the only time I can commune with certain elementals.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't expect you to understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't expect you to understand.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... Come in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... Come in.

Entries.DialogueText: I am Rasmodius... Seeker of the arcane truths.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I am Rasmodius... Seeker of the arcane truths.

Entries.DialogueText: Mediary between physical and ethereal.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mediary between physical and ethereal.

Entries.DialogueText: Master of the seven elementals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Master of the seven elementals.

Entries.DialogueText: Keeper of the sacred cha-... you get the point.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Keeper of the sacred cha-... you get the point.

Entries.DialogueText: And you... {Farmer_Name}. The one whose arrival I have long foreseen.
Entries.DisplayPattern: And you... . The one whose arrival I have long foreseen.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I'd like to show you something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I'd like to show you something.

Entries.DialogueText: Behold!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Behold!

Entries.DialogueText: You've seen one before, haven't you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've seen one before, haven't you?

Entries.DialogueText: They call themselves the 'Junimos'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: They call themselves the 'Junimos'...

Entries.DialogueText: Mysterious spirits, these ones... For some reason, they refuse to speak with me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mysterious spirits, these ones... For some reason, they refuse to speak with me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not sure why they've moved into the community center, but you have no reason to fear them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not sure why they've moved into the community center, but you have no reason to fear them.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm? You found a golden scroll written in an unknown language?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm? You found a golden scroll written in an unknown language?

Entries.DialogueText: Most interesting...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most interesting...

Entries.DialogueText: Stay here. I'm going to see for myself. I'll return shortly.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Stay here. I'm going to see for myself. I'll return shortly.

Entries.DialogueText: I found the note...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found the note...

Entries.DialogueText: The language is obscure, but I was able to decipher it:
Entries.DisplayPattern: The language is obscure, but I was able to decipher it:

Entries.DialogueText: We, the Junimo, are happy to aid you. In return, we ask for gifts of the valley. If you are one with the forest then you will see the true nature of this scroll.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We, the Junimo, are happy to aid you. In return, we ask for gifts of the valley. If you are one with the forest then you will see the true nature of this scroll.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... 'One with the forest'... What do they mean?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... 'One with the forest'... What do they mean?

Entries.DialogueText: ...*sniff*...*sniff*...
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...*sniff*...*sniff*...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah-hah! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah-hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Come here! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come here!

Entries.DialogueText: My cauldron is bubbling with ingredients from the forest. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My cauldron is bubbling with ingredients from the forest.

Entries.DialogueText: Baby fern, moss grub, caramel-top toadstool... Can you smell it? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Baby fern, moss grub, caramel-top toadstool... Can you smell it?

Entries.DialogueText: Here. Drink up. Let the essence of the forest permeate your body. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here. Drink up. Let the essence of the forest permeate your body.

Entries.DialogueText: You've gained the power of forest magic! Now you can decipher the true meaning of the Junimo scrolls.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've gained the power of forest magic! Now you can decipher the true meaning of the Junimo scrolls.

Entries.DialogueText: You've found my ink! Excellent.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've found my ink! Excellent.

Entries.DialogueText: Er...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er...

Entries.DialogueText: Did you... happen to see my ex-wife?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you... happen to see my ex-wife?

Entries.DialogueText: No? Well, what about her house...?
Entries.DisplayPattern: No? Well, what about her house...?

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think she lives alone? Or... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think she lives alone? Or...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Actually, don't tell me... I don't want to know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Actually, don't tell me... I don't want to know.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway... you must be wondering about your reward. Here...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway... you must be wondering about your reward. Here...

Entries.DialogueText: It's a book of summoning.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a book of summoning.

Entries.DialogueText: The arcane potential is immense... but I'll make it simple for you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The arcane potential is immense... but I'll make it simple for you.

Entries.DialogueText: By using this book, you can summon magic buildings directly to your farm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: By using this book, you can summon magic buildings directly to your farm.

Entries.DialogueText: I think you'll find it useful.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think you'll find it useful.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I almost forgot to say... ahem... Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I almost forgot to say... ahem... Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Silence! Both of you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Silence! Both of you!

Entries.DialogueText: The Elemental Wars have long been finished. You have no reason to be fighting any longer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The Elemental Wars have long been finished. You have no reason to be fighting any longer.

Entries.DialogueText: The two of you must make peace for the sake of the humans that live around you. Surely you can see that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The two of you must make peace for the sake of the humans that live around you. Surely you can see that.

Entries.DialogueText: Very good. I shall cast a 'Seal of Promise' to finalize this agreement.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Very good. I shall cast a 'Seal of Promise' to finalize this agreement.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... {Farmer_Name}. I've been waiting for you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... . I've been waiting for you.

Entries.DialogueText: Have I ever told you I used to be married?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have I ever told you I used to be married?

Entries.DialogueText: Strange, I know... for a man like me. But it's true.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Strange, I know... for a man like me. But it's true.

Entries.DialogueText: My wife and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove her away.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My wife and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove her away.

Entries.DialogueText: Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path...

Entries.DialogueText: When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic.

Entries.DialogueText: But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, she took my magic ink!
Entries.DisplayPattern: But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, she took my magic ink!

Entries.DialogueText: I need that magic ink back! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I need that magic ink back!

Entries.DialogueText: I would do this myself, but I... I can't see her again. That's why I need your help.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I would do this myself, but I... I can't see her again. That's why I need your help.

Entries.DialogueText: In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one.
Entries.DisplayPattern: In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!

Entries.DialogueText: Welwick and I have known each other for a long time... she is a remarkable diviner, and a good friend.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welwick and I have known each other for a long time... she is a remarkable diviner, and a good friend.

Entries.DialogueText: That clown... I know him from somewhere.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That clown... I know him from somewhere.

Entries.DialogueText: Was it the school of illusion? Or maybe the Carnival of Secrets? Hmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Was it the school of illusion? Or maybe the Carnival of Secrets? Hmm...

Entries.DialogueText: If you wish to peer through the mists of tomorrow, speak to my colleague Welwick. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you wish to peer through the mists of tomorrow, speak to my colleague Welwick.

Entries.DialogueText: She has an uncommon gift...
Entries.DisplayPattern: She has an uncommon gift...

Entries.DialogueText: That young man by the tree seemed intrigued by his reading, but even with my powers, I cannot probe the innermost secrets of the heart... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That young man by the tree seemed intrigued by his reading, but even with my powers, I cannot probe the innermost secrets of the heart...

Entries.DialogueText: The affairs of mundane folk matter little to me, but the elementals like a chance to see you up close.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The affairs of mundane folk matter little to me, but the elementals like a chance to see you up close.

Entries.DialogueText: It was for them that I created this silly maze.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was for them that I created this silly maze.

Entries.DialogueText: The trials continue... Every magician must have an apprentice...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The trials continue... Every magician must have an apprentice...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... And what about raw lizard egg sprinkled with blackened marrow?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... And what about raw lizard egg sprinkled with blackened marrow?

Entries.DialogueText: You shouldn't be up here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You shouldn't be up here.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm? How did you climb up here? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm? How did you climb up here?

Entries.DialogueText: The merpeople are curious about your festivities.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The merpeople are curious about your festivities.

Entries.DialogueText: They become upset when you litter into the ocean.
Entries.DisplayPattern: They become upset when you litter into the ocean.

Entries.DialogueText: In the dark depths of the sea lie many mysteries, waiting to be uncovered. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: In the dark depths of the sea lie many mysteries, waiting to be uncovered.

Entries.DialogueText: How did you find me back here? I thought I was well-hidden.
Entries.DisplayPattern: How did you find me back here? I thought I was well-hidden.

Entries.DialogueText: Perhaps you are blessed with the gift of clairvoyance.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Perhaps you are blessed with the gift of clairvoyance.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm here to observe the Lunaloos... or 'Moonlight Jellies', as you call them. They possess an unusually potent magical aura for an aquatic life form.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm here to observe the Lunaloos... or 'Moonlight Jellies', as you call them. They possess an unusually potent magical aura for an aquatic life form.

Entries.DialogueText: The glowing eggs of the Lunaloos make for a potent reagent...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The glowing eggs of the Lunaloos make for a potent reagent...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, the mysterious Winter Star. One of the reasons I chose this valley as the location for my... research.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, the mysterious Winter Star. One of the reasons I chose this valley as the location for my... research.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, the mysterious Winter Star. One of the reasons I chose this valley as the location for my... research.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, the mysterious Winter Star. One of the reasons I chose this valley as the location for my... research.

Entries.DialogueText: Sneaking off to visit my weird tower? You're odd for a mundane.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sneaking off to visit my weird tower? You're odd for a mundane.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm? How did you get here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm? How did you get here?

Entries.DialogueText: Pay no attention to me. I'm simply observing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pay no attention to me. I'm simply observing...

Entries.DialogueText: Ahh, this is imbued with potent arcane energies. It's very useful for my studies. Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahh, this is imbued with potent arcane energies. It's very useful for my studies. Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Many thanks. This item has some very interesting properties.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Many thanks. This item has some very interesting properties.

Entries.DialogueText: This?... I suppose I'll cast it into the flames and see what happens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This?... I suppose I'll cast it into the flames and see what happens.

Entries.DialogueText: Ughh... These are utterly mundane. Please refrain from bothering me with this in the future.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ughh... These are utterly mundane. Please refrain from bothering me with this in the future.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you. This will prove useful, I think.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you. This will prove useful, I think.

Entries.DialogueText: What are you doing? I only allow those I trust to enter there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What are you doing? I only allow those I trust to enter there.

Entries.DialogueText: I sense an arcane power permeating this building tonight...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I sense an arcane power permeating this building tonight...

Entries.DialogueText: And to think... the layman has no idea that this is all raw, real footage!
Entries.DisplayPattern: And to think... the layman has no idea that this is all raw, real footage!

Entries.DialogueText: There's a twinkle in Wizard's eye...
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's a twinkle in Wizard's eye...

Entries.DialogueText: For those aware of the esoteric mysteries, that had deep significance...
Entries.DisplayPattern: For those aware of the esoteric mysteries, that had deep significance...

Entries.DialogueText: You pulled me from my studies for *this*?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You pulled me from my studies for *this*?
